physical_appearance:\The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It has a black frame and its border is white in colour. The ceiling is concave and it is high from the ground. There are numerous people in the photograph
 some sitting down and standing up. A number of them are queueing up at the ticket counter
 which is located at the left hand side of the photograph. At the centre of the image
 a shop called \\Tourism Malaysia\\ is present. The framed initials of the Federated Malay States Railway

subject_terms_4:in a single row. The coat-of-arms of the Federated Malay States Railway is displayed in between the framed letters of \\FMSR\\\

metadata.physical_appearance: "The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It has a black frame and its border is white in colour. The ceiling is concave and it is high from the ground. There are numerous people in the photograph, some sitting down and standing up. A number of them are queueing up at the ticket counter, which is located at the left hand side of the photograph. At the centre of the image, a shop called ""Tourism Malaysia"" is present. The framed initials of the Federated Malay States Railway
